title: The Skins That We All Know We Need.
body:
Here are the skins that I think Riot his severely missed out on making. Some anyway, others are just fun ideas.

{{champion:161}} "Hel'koz" Fiery volcanic themed skin.
"Spell'koz" Maybe a more... Hextech version, or like {{champion:101}}  themed?
"Shell'Koz" Underwater theme. Hydro cannon!

{{champion:112}} "Viktorious" Victorious skin.

{{champion:111}} "Definitely Nautilus" Play on words for "definitely NOT" skins.

{{champion:266}} "Bee keeper Aatrox" We already have Aatrox(A) and Sea(C) Hunter Aatrox, so why not a B? xD 

{{champion:1}} "Nannie" This could go 2 ways I suppose? Old nanny looking bear or big baby with little old lady. Disturbing? Yes.
"Candy Annie" Giant gummy bear, fully awesome.

{{champion:22}} "Must Ashe" Like... gentleman version, come on guys women love wearing fake mustaches. {{champion:201}} approved.

{{champion:53}} "Toy Blitzcrank" like a "Rock 'em Sock 'em Robot", it would be great.

{{champion:420}} "Dunkmaster" Already has a ball she carries... Figure out what to do with tentacles. Bam! Done. Even just making them inverted nets, with the rim at the bottom. Doesn't have to be that special.

{{champion:105}} "Show Bizz" Theater/Circus themed. Maybe throws an award that gets gobbled up.

{{champion:150}} "Gnar Gnar Binks" Okay okay, this one is just a joke. Sorry.

{{champion:141}} "Kandy Kayn" Like... we shouldn't even have to ask for this.
Cosmic Assassin Kayn(Shadow Assassin) and Darkin Star Rhaast(Darkin).
Any 2 side skin lines work.

{{champion:82}} Literally... just give us a decent skin. Change some effects on the skin. He doesn't have a lot of reason to use other skins right now. Maybe "Freljordekaiser" Ice theme.
"Battle Boss Morde" arcade theme.
 "Project M.O.R.D.E." with matrix looking ghosts.
Also a rework is needed. No real gap closer or cc in his kit, he gets kited probably the hardest of any champ. I remember with Rylai's and Deadman's I still couldn't catch people with my ult on them. Just an immobile tank killed with any cc, as his passive needs abilities going off to let him survive. Done ranting.

{{champion:516}} "Thornn" Elderwood theme.
"Frost Bornn" Ice theme.

{{champion:421}} "Mech'Sai" They have all other void creature mech skins.
"Ship Wreck'Sai" Water creature theme.
"Hextech'Sai" Hextech skin.

{{champion:555}} "Motor Pyke" Bike gang looking skin.
"Airstrike Pyke" Maybe... I just like fun named skins.
"Bandit Pyke" Western theme.

{{champion:13}} "French Ryze" Fast food theme.
"Sun Ryze" Fire theme.

{{champion:101}} "Program Xerath" or something, he needs a new skin.

{{champion:106}} "Jollybear" Christmas theme.

{{champion:8}} "Gladimir" Christmas Theme.

{{champion:29}} "Glitch" Program theme.

{{champion:163}} "Pool Party Taliyah" Surfboard, coral reef wall, floor of crabs that snap. Many possibilities.

{{champion:72}} "Deep Sea Terror Skarner" He needs a skin, he needs remembered.

{{champion:68}} "Rumble Bee" Sounds good in theory.

{{champion:90}} "Dark Star Malzahar" Already has space aids.

{{champion:154}} "Balloon Zac" Hard to think of skins for him, but he needs one.



Let me know if there are any other "hidden gem" skins or fantastic ideas.
What has Riot missed out on cashing out on?

=======Current Champ Skin Count(Not including base)=======
==={12}===
Ezreal, Miss Fortune
==={11}===
Alistar, Annie, Twisted Fate
==={10}===
Ashe, Blitzcrank, Dr. Mundo, Gragas, Jax, Katarina, Kog'Maw, Ryze, Sivir, Teemo
==={9}===
Ahri, Akali, Amumu, Caitlyn, Fiddlesticks, Gangplank, Garen, Graves, Janna, Kayle, Lee Sin, Lux, Master Yi, Nidalee, Poppy, Renekton, Singed, Soraka, Tryndamere, Tristana, Twitch, Veigar, Warwick
==={8}===
Corki, Jarven IV, Leona, Lulu, Malphite, Morgana, Nasus, Orianna, Pantheon, Rammus, Riven, Sona, Vayne, Vladimir, Xin Zhao
==={7}===
Anivia, Cho'Gath, Darius, Draven, Fizz, Hecarim, Karma, Kennen, Malzahar, Maokai, Nunu & Willump, Olaf, Sejuani, Shaco, Shen, Varus, Ziggs
==={6}===
Brand, Evelynn, Fiora, Galio, Gnar, Heimerdinger, Irelia, Jinx, Karthus, LeBlanc, Nami, Nocturne, Shyvana, Syndra, Talon, Thresh, Vi, Wukong
==={5}===
Braum, Cassiopeia, Diana, Ekko, Elise, Kassadin, Kha'Zix, Lucian, Mordekaiser, Nautilus, Sion, Trundle, Volibear, Yasuo, Zed, Zilean
==={4}===
Azir, Jayce, Jhin, Lissandra, Quinn, Rengar, Rumble, Skarner, Swain, Taric, Udyr, Urgot, Viktor, Xerath, Zyra
==={3}===
Aatrox, Bard, Kalista, Rakan, Vel'Koz, Xayah, Yorick, Zac
==={2}===
Aurelion, Camille, Illaoi, Kai'Sa, Kayn, Kindred, Kled, Rek'Sai, Tahm Kench, Taliyah, Zoe
==={1}===
Ivern, Neeko, Ornn, Pyke

Ivern, Rek'Sai, Yorick, Taric, and Sion are the oldest champs in their respective 1-5 alternative skins.
Rek'Sai, Morde, Xerath, Skarner, and Zilean are the longest champs since they got a new skin, at least under 6 skins. All around April-June of 2015. Over 3.5 years. So they DEFINITELY need a new skin.

replies.body: {{champion:421}} Giga’Sai, continent-sized, forests and mountains on the back, underside made of lava.
Or since she is never getting a new skin "Wrek'Sigh". An old defeated Rek'Sai with booze and pictures of her former self actually getting picked once in awhile. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Proctologist {{champion:53}}
Noone fists you like dr Blitz does!
100% agree on the Elderwood {{champion:516}} , that'd be so epic :O
Kinda like Ivern's grumpy cousin? xD

>Cosmic Assassin Kayn(Shadow Assassin) and Darkin Star Rhaast(Darkin).

That is the forms he takes in his odyssesy skin, so we already have it XD

I guess you could view it as such... I always thought they were a bit more intense, and less classic space villian-ish. But still a valid point.
Kandy Kayn will have to be enough for now.

> [{quoted}](name=Mr Voidling,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=QE2RspG3,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-11-21T16:53:47.546+0000)
>
> Wouldn't Grinch Trundle match better? {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Idk.

I just want to see Trundle in a Santa outfit smacking people with a Christmas tree.

> [{quoted}](name=Mr Voidling,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=QE2RspG3,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-20T20:46:07.095+0000)
>
> {{champion:163}} &quot;Pool Party Taliyah&quot; Surfboard, coral reef wall, floor of crabs that snap. Many possibilities.

She just needs skins, Riot's unwillingness to make her skins is getting beyond a meme/joke. But I guess, Yi does need more.
I think I'ma look into how many skins each champ actual has, and add that in order of number of skins. I honestly didn't realize Annie had more than Ahri.
i disagree with every skin you mentioned
If you can't agree with "Kandy Kayn" or "Motor Pyke" or "Pool Party Taliyah" then... idk man. 100 more Ahri skins? {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
I'd rather have Cyber Pop Taliyah. Skateboards > Surfboards.
Pretty sure the pool party would sell more for Riot though... for certain "visual" reasons. However, yes, skateboards ftw.

Zombie Malzahar - E has Plague Inc. vibes, Voidlings are zombified.

Anunu & Willump - Nunu but depressed and Willump doesn’t like him.  Neither does anyone else.

Omega Squad Maokai - Yeah the line is Yordles-only, but come on.  Mechanized mines on treads.

Debonair Mecha Trundle - Pure awesome.  Must retain base Trundle’s dance, while playing something similar to the song from Dunkey’s Trundle video.

Hax - Basically Program Jax but red and glitchy.

Littlesticks - This could go one of two ways: a kid Fid, or a dank flaming Fid.

Spooky Lucian - Lucian wearing a sheet.  Wins by making the enemy die laughing.

Mad Bomber Zilean - Throws packets of C4, clock is replaced with a giant wrapped package (definitely not a bomb).

K/DA Sona - Glaringly obvious.  Some form of Popstar skin for Sona.  Listen to pop in-game (not my thing, but will sell like turkeys before Thanksgiving hehexd).

Dragon Queen Shyvana - This one’s a Legendary from the Dragon skin line world.  Regal VO, shining armor and fancy robes, turns into an actual dragon instead of a wyvern.

Skarnerd - Skarner with glasses and a backpack.  Utterly adorable tbh.

Hayle - Unimaginative ice-themed Kayle skin.

Alien Invader Pantheon - Drops from the sky and says “TAKE ME TO YOUR LEADER.”

Hahaha nice! {{sticker:sg-kiko}} 

Littlesticks sounds like a total rapper name. My boy rapping so hard he leaves them speechless.

Is it Yordles only? I didn't think Twitch was a Yordle, if anything he seems like he would be closer to a vastaya. And I'm always a fan of skin lines having at least a champ for every role.

And whilst I can't see a K/DA skin for Sona, since it's more of a singing group than an actual band with music players, I definitely think the pop music playing would be a cash grab for Riot.

Maybe Zil could have an actual timer on his bombs that counts down on that skin.

What if they had Champion costume skins? Like, Panth dressed as Galio so his R looked like Galio R and vice versa. Thresh/Pyke. Blitz/Naut. Morg/Swain(or Morg/Janna) Lux/Urgot... wait what?
